blank1_name_sec2 = Address | blank1_info_sec2 = 103-2 Motoshiro-chō, Chuō-ku, Hamamatsu-shi, Shizuoka-ken 430-8652 | website = | footnotes = }} Hamamatsu is a city in Shizuoka Prefecture, Japan.Nussbaum, Louis-Frédéric. (2005). "Hamamatsu" in Japan Encyclopedia, p. 282. It is on the island of Honshū. Every May 3-5, the Hammamatsu Festival is held in the city. There are three wards (Chūō, Hamana, and Tenryū) in this city on and after January 1, 2024. ==Related page== * Honda F.C. ==References== Category:Cities in Shizuoka Prefecture
title: Hamamatsu
